column4: Noob needing help installing Opera and then Java for it. Any takers?
to intstall Opera, download the package and use dpkg -i operapackagename
Well, I did that. Installed the package.
Now what?
installed which package?
The Opera Debian package
So I downloaded the Opera Debian PPC Package and used dpkg -i to set it up.
does it show up in your menu?
It's all there, now how do I use it?
No...
type locate opera in te terminal
It doesn't come up...
I think that it may be where I downloaded it.
It ended up in /tmp/
should that matter?
I did the installtion from the /tmp directory.
type opera in the terminal it should start, Im trying to find where it installs at
Nope.
opera: cannot connect to X server
I cant help you on that one.
Ok. Thanks anyhoo.
I appreciate you trying.
I think it's a PPC thing... (Boring...)
you dont like firefox?
